laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates normal echotexture without focal lesions. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Visualized portions of the pancreas and inferior vena cava are unremarkable. No right hydronephrosis is demonstrated. There is a 17 mm non-mobile calculus in the region of the gallbladder neck. The gallbladder is minimally distended with mild wall thickening. There is a positive sonographic ___ sign. The gallbladder contains a small amount of layering echogenic material. No pericholecystic fluid is seen.
